name: Trapped Alone
description:
Credits : Marsh Davies

Team :

UnsolvedRubiks [Programmer] @unsolvedrubik

Andre Rojas [Artist/Designer]

Controls:

Left Mouse Click - Execute action (Pick up/Build/Craft)

Right Mouse Click - Rotate build item horizontally

Alt - Regenerate Levels

WASD - Move

Space - Climb

F - Crafting

E - Use equipped slot

1-8 / Mousewheel - Equip a slot
